unnormalised: Hey guys, anyone else hooked on athlete bios these days? Just finished reading about PT Usha, amazing! Remember that Doordarshan docu on her? Also, are there any good ones about cricketers? I heard someone mention a bio on Dhoni is in the works. Hoping they get a good actor for it like in "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag". What say? Jai Hind!
